system.description:
A blood bag filled with discolored—often green— blood-like fluid. About as useful a beverage as a normal blood pack, but highly irradiated.

  • Special: Roll 2 @fos[DC] when determining if the drink inflicts Radiation damage, rather than 1 @fos[DC]. You suffer 1 Radiation damage, ignoring damage resistance, for each Effect rolled.
system.effect: Roll 2 @fos[DC] rather than 1 for determining Radiation damage when consumed
